participant_1.background:
I don't wash my clothes as often as I should.
I'm going to be practicing my music and trying to get back into shape for choir.
My biggest fear is not being able to overcome my eating disorder and being stuck in this cycle forever.
I'm not close with my family, but my friends are everything to me.
I enjoy being able to keep my mental faculties sharp by memorizing lines from movies and board games.

participant_2.background:
My flute playing is a form of self-expression and a way to connect with my inner self.
I lost my best friend, my dog, when I was away on business.
i ride a skateboard.
my name is dave.
i enjoy comedies.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks for asking! I'm practicing my music for choir and trying to get back into shape.
Nice! I love music and I'm really glad you're trying to get back into shape. I try to do that too but I'm not always good at it.
I'm not always good at it either, but I'm trying! What kind of music do you like?
I like all kinds of music, but I especially love playing the flute.
That's so cool! I always wanted to learn how to play the flute, but I never got around to it.
You should! It's a lot of fun and it's a great way to express yourself.
I might just have to do that! Thanks for the encouragement!
No problem! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time with my friends and family, and I also enjoy reading, writing, and watching movies.
Those all sound like great things to do! I like to do a lot of the same things, except I don't read as much as I used to.
That's okay! I'm sure you have plenty of other hobbies that you enjoy.
I do! I love to skateboard and I also enjoy watching comedies.
That's awesome! I've never been able to skateboard, but I've always wanted to try.
You should! It's a lot of fun and it's a great way to get exercise.
I might just have to do that! Thanks for the suggestion!
No problem! I'm glad I could help.
